Buwas Cerita Masalah Besar Bulog: Ngutang untuk Impor Beras
01 Nov 2019, 06:57 by Vadhia Lidyana


Dirut Bulog Budi Waseso/Foto: Vadhia Lidyana

Jakarta - Direktur Utama Bulog Budi Waseso menceritakan persoalan saat mulai memimpin Bulog. Pria yang beken disapa Buwas itu menjelaskan usai dilantik sebagai Dirut Bulog pada April 2018 lalu tak menyangka begitu banyak persoalan yang harus dihadapi."Dengan situasi Bulog itu tidak ideal menurut saya. Karena kita penugasan satu sisi, tapi justru di situlah Bulog terjerat dalam suatu permasalahan," kata Buwas dalam acara Ngopi BUMN, di kantor Kementerian BUMN, Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Dia mencontohkan saat pemerintah meminta Bulog menyerap beras petani, atau pun impor beras dalam mengisi Cadangan Beras Pemerintah (CBP), keuangan Bulog yang jadi jaminannya."Kita dapat penugasan dari negara untuk impor beras contohnya, ini kan beras CBP, tapi yang mengimpor dan membeli Bulog, uangnya pinjam, utangnya Bulog. Ini masalah besar, karena nilainya triliunan dan bunganya komersial. Sedangkan CBP ini tidak bisa kita jual belikan kecuali ada penugasan," ungkap Buwas.Belum lagi isu-isu yang menimpa Bulog seperti kualitas berasnya jelek dan pandangan itu telah tercetak di kalangan masyarakat. Sehingga, beras Bulog sulit disalurkan dan akhirnya mengendap di gudang. Dengan lamanya beras mengendap di gudang, kualitasnya terancam menurun."Maka Bulog harus menjaga kualitas beras. Sehingga mulai ditertibkan bagaimana sistem penyimpanan yang baik, bagaimana membuat gudang yang mumpuni. Termasuk regulasi yang saya tempur dan pemahaman karyawan-karyawan saya untuk CBP-nya," imbuh dia.Menurutnya, ketika Bulog tak bisa menyalurkan beras dengan kualitas yang baik, atau harga yang terjangkau maka masyarakat yang bertindak. "Bulog berkaitan dengan masalah beras. Kalau Bulog gagal menangani ini sehingga mengakibatkan keresahan, kalau beras nggak ada yang gelisah siapa? Ibu-ibu. Kalau berasnya jelek yg marah siapa? Ibu-ibu. Kalau berasnya mahal siapa yang marah? Ibu-ibu. Bulog sebagai penyuplai beras yang dimarahin nanti, apalagi Dirutnya. Jadi jangan pikir saya suara keras tidak ada tujuannya," tutur mantan Kepala Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) itu.

Buwas Stories of Bulog's Big Problem: Debt for Rice Import
01 Nov 2019, 06:57 by Vadhia Lidyana


Managing Director of Bulog Budi Waseso / Photo: Vadhia Lidyana

Jakarta - Managing Director of Bulog Budi Waseso told of the problem when he began to lead Bulog. The man who was well known as Buwas explained that after being appointed as Bulog's Managing Director in April 2018, he did not expect so many problems to be faced. , "Buwas said at the BUMN Coffee event, at the BUMN Ministry office, Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). He gave an example when the government asked Bulog to absorb farmers' rice, or even import rice in filling the Government's Rice Reserve (CBP), Bulog's finance "We can get an assignment from the state to import rice, for example, this is CBP rice, but those who import and buy Bulog, borrow money, borrow Bulog. This is a big problem, because the value is trillions and commercial interest. Whereas CBP cannot be used by us. sell and buy unless there is an assignment, "said Buwas. Not to mention the issues that befall Bulog such as the poor quality of rice and that view has been printed among the community kat. Thus, Bulog rice is difficult to distribute and eventually settles in warehouses. With the length of time the rice settles in the warehouse, the quality is threatened to decline. "So the Bulog must maintain the quality of rice. So that it starts to be disciplined how a good storage system, how to make a capable warehouse. Including regulations that I combat and understanding my employees for the CBP, "he added. According to him, when Bulog could not distribute rice with good quality, or an affordable price, the people acted. "Bulog is related to the problem of rice. If Bulog fails to deal with this, it will cause unrest, if there is no one who is uneasy about rice? Ladies. If the rice is ugly, who is angry? Women. If the rice is expensive, who is angry? "Bulog as the rice supplier will be scolded later, let alone the President Director. So don't think I have a loud voice that there is no purpose," said the former Head of the National Narcotics Agency (BNN).
